item.title: WorkMate
item.description: The first workplace management system to combine out-of-the-box simplicity with enterprise-level configuration & scalability

item.title: Desk Booking
item.description: Configurable desk booking management at scale without hardware lock-in

item.title: Government Agency - Multi-Tenancy: Space as a Service
item.description: This Government Agency required a multifunctional and scalable workspace management system to serve various federal agencies. It must accurately authenticate users to manage and charge for space utilization, and provide a scalable model suitable for other government spaces facing underutilization.

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: December 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: December 2024 WorkMate updates include new parking utilization reports, kiosk customizations, recurring desk bookings, added language support and room alerts.

item.title: Auto Assign Desks & Car Spaces
item.description: Auto-assign desks by department and car spaces with ANPR integration for efficient visitor management.

item.title: New Feature: Locking Booking
item.description: Explore PlaceOS’s Locker Booking System: Easy reservations, access control, visual booking, and flexibility for workplaces and visitor management.

item.title: How to Create a Desk Booking App for Your Office Needs
item.description: Discover the steps to effectively scope a desk booking app. Optimize your office space with a tailored desk booking solution that meets your requirements.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Concierge - Managing Workplace Experience
item.description: Elevate your hybrid workplace with our advanced workplace management app. Discover how to enhance the workplace experience and streamline operations.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: PlaceAI - ChatGPT & Object Recognition Features
item.description: Discover the benefits of Chat GPT integration in your workplace. Join our live demo to see how this AI assistant can enhance productivity and streamline tasks.

item.title: Managing Technology Redundancy in IoT and Smart Buildings
item.description: Learn how to effectively deal with technology redundancy in IoT and smart buildings. Discover strategies to optimize systems and ensure continuous performance.

item.title: Workplace Management App: New Features and Enhancements
item.description: Explore the new features of the refreshed Concierge workplace management app. Improve efficiency and optimize your workplace with our innovative solutions.

item.title: April 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: POI QR code support, public map kiosk, enhanced MapsPeople search, backoffice warnings, and driver updates.

item.title: February 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: Added Secure S3 Uploads, enhanced MapBox and MapsPeople integration, and new Work Locations feature, Improved visitor booking

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Energy Analytics Dashboards, Outlook Plugin & More
item.description: A live demonstration of our latest in Commercial Building Energy Analytics, our Outlook Plugin & workplace application.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Understanding Energy Analytics, Surveys & Catering
item.description: A live demo about technical details behind our energy analytics tools, valuable insights from surveys & our catering tool.

item.title: When to go with a custom or packaged smart building solution
item.description: When it comes to smart building solutions, choosing when to go custom or packaged is difficult. Here’s how to approach it.
